page.title: 13GETTING FROM PLACE TO PLACE
page.content: TRANSPORT Westonzoyland is a fairly large village four miles from the town of Bridgwater.The bus service is very poor;there being only 5 buses a day through the village with fewer on Tuesdays & Thursdays.This is Far less than ten years ago. people have to rely on cars to get about.A survey of car ownership today and ten years ago shows: 1975 1985 %of households 76% 87% owning cars % of households owning or using 94% 75% works car Italy 3% COUNTRY OF 12% Germany0% ORIGIN OF CAR 5% Sweden 0% 5% Japan 3% 5% these figures are only very approx.
